mapper.select: SELECT subcontractor_name, subcontractor_person, subcontractor_tel, subcontractor_email, subcontractor_address, subcontractor_date FROM subcontractor ORDER BY subcontractor_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subcontractor (subcontractor_name, subcontractor_person, subcontractor_tel, subcontractor_email, subcontractor_address) VALUES (#{ subcontractor_name }, #{ subcontractor_person }, #{ subcontractor_tel }, #{ subcontractor_email }, #{ subcontractor_address })
